name: The Spirit Bounty Hunters - Grim's 11th hour
name_original: The Spirit Bounty Hunters - Grim's 11th hour
description:
As a Spirit Bounty Hunter, it’s your job to apprehend supernatural beings that have broken the spiritual laws. This time around you have to arrest The Grim Reaper as he has blocked the soul migration from mortal earth to the spirit world.  

It’s a role play game. Your story starts in the spirit realm where you receive your mission and choose your gender and move to the mortal world. You train as one of the main mage types: fire, ice or nature mage. You will do different missions and acquire super magical: weapons, armor and along the way, some companions will join you.

Battle many different foes which require different strategies to win and at the end, you will receive a score which you must try and beat next time around. Each time should be different, with different random items that greatly affect the outcome of the game. It's an open world game, although there is a story thread throughout.
